mapper.select:
SELECT TOP 10 ROW_NUMBER() OVER ( ORDER BY Duration1 desc) "id1", facility_id1, fault_description1, Occurrences1, Duration1 FROM ( Select ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY fault_description ORDER BY TotalDuration desc) ROWNUMS, facility_id "facility_id1", fault_description "fault_description1", Occurrences "Occurrences1", TotalDuration "Duration1" FROM ( select facility_id,fault_description, count(fault_description) Occurrences, sum(convert(float,datediff(SS,start_time,Current_End_Time))/60) TotalDuration from( select fault_description,facility_id, start_time,ISNULL(end_time,GETDATE()) Current_End_Time from PMC.dbo.PMC_BIW_FAULT t where 1 = 1 AND CONVERT (VARCHAR(10), start_time, 23) IN (#{fromDate0},#{fromDate1},#{fromDate2},#{fromDate3},#{fromDate4},#{fromDate5},#{fromDate6}) AND CONVERT (VARCHAR(10), end_time, 23) IN (#{fromDate0},#{fromDate1},#{fromDate2},#{fromDate3},#{fromDate4},#{fromDate5},#{fromDate6})
and fault_word3 !=0 and duration is not NULL and end_time is not null and tav_flag!=1 )T group by facility_id,fault_description )ALL_DATA )FINAL
order by Duration1 desc, Occurrences1 desc, facility_id1,fault_description1

select count(fault_description) "TotOcc1" , sum(convert(float,datediff(SS,start_time,Current_End_Time))/60) TotDuration1 from( select fault_description, facility_id,start_time, ISNULL(end_time,GETDATE()) Current_End_Time from PMC.dbo.PMC_BIW_FAULT t where 1 = 1 and convert(varchar(10),start_time,23) in (#{fromDate0},#{fromDate1},#{fromDate2},#{fromDate3},#{fromDate4},#{fromDate5},#{fromDate6}) AND CONVERT (VARCHAR(10), end_time, 23) IN (#{fromDate0},#{fromDate1},#{fromDate2},#{fromDate3},#{fromDate4},#{fromDate5},#{fromDate6})
and fault_word3 !=0 and duration is not NULL and end_time is not null and t.tav_flag!= 1 )T

select ROW_NUMBER() OVER ( ORDER BY ROWNUMS,Duration2 desc) "id2", facility_id2, fault_description2, Occurrences2, Duration2 from ( SELECT TOP 100000000000 facility_id2, fault_description2, Occurrences2, Duration2, ROWNUMS FROM( Select ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY fault_description ORDER BY TotalDuration desc) ROWNUMS, facility_id "facility_id2", fault_description "fault_description2", Occurrences "Occurrences2", TotalDuration "Duration2" FROM ( select facility_id,fault_description, count(fault_description) Occurrences, sum(convert(float,datediff(SS,start_time,Current_End_Time))/60) TotalDuration from( select fault_description, facility_id, start_time, ISNULL(end_time,GETDATE()) Current_End_Time from PMC.dbo.PMC_BIW_FAULT t where 1 = 1 and convert(varchar(10),start_time,23) in (#{toDate0},#{toDate1},#{toDate2},#{toDate3},#{toDate4},#{toDate5},#{toDate6}) and convert(varchar(10),end_time,23) in (#{toDate0},#{toDate1},#{toDate2},#{toDate3},#{toDate4},#{toDate5},#{toDate6})
and fault_word3 !=0 and duration is not NULL and end_time is not null and t.tav_flag!= 1 )T group by facility_id,fault_description )ALL_DATA )FINAL order by Duration2 desc, Occurrences2 desc, facility_id2,fault_description2 )TOPVALS order by ROWNUMS, Duration2 desc;

select count(fault_description) "TotOcc2" , sum(convert(float,datediff(SS,start_time,Current_End_Time))/60) TotDuration2 from( select fault_description, facility_id,start_time, ISNULL(end_time,GETDATE()) Current_End_Time from PMC.dbo.PMC_BIW_FAULT t where 1 = 1 and convert(varchar(10),start_time,23) in (#{toDate0},#{toDate1},#{toDate2},#{toDate3},#{toDate4},#{toDate5},#{toDate6}) and convert(varchar(10),end_time,23) in (#{toDate0},#{toDate1},#{toDate2},#{toDate3},#{toDate4},#{toDate5},#{toDate6})
and fault_word3 !=0 and duration is not NULL and end_time is not null and t.tav_flag!= 1 )T

SELECT TOP 10 facility_id1, fault_description1, Occurrences1, Duration1 FROM ( Select ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY fault_description ORDER BY Occurrences desc) ROWNUMS, facility_id "facility_id1", fault_description "fault_description1", Occurrences "Occurrences1", TotalDuration "Duration1" FROM ( select facility_id,fault_description,count(fault_description) Occurrences,sum(convert(float,datediff(SS,start_time,Current_End_Time))/60) TotalDuration from( select fault_description,facility_id,start_time,ISNULL(end_time,GETDATE()) Current_End_Time from PMC.dbo.PMC_BIW_FAULT t WHERE 1 = 1 and convert(varchar(10),start_time,23) in (#{fromDate0},#{fromDate1},#{fromDate2},#{fromDate3},#{fromDate4},#{fromDate5},#{fromDate6}) and convert(varchar(10),end_time,23) in (#{fromDate0},#{fromDate1},#{fromDate2},#{fromDate3},#{fromDate4},#{fromDate5},#{fromDate6})
and fault_word3 !=0 and duration is not NULL and end_time is not null and t.tav_flag!= 1 )T group by facility_id,fault_description )ALL_DATA )FINAL
order by Occurrences1 desc, Duration1 desc, facility_id1,fault_description1

select ROW_NUMBER() OVER ( ORDER BY ROWNUMS, Occurrences2 desc) "id2", facility_id2,fault_description2,Occurrences2,Duration2 from ( SELECT TOP 100000000000 facility_id2, fault_description2, Occurrences2, Duration2, ROWNUMS FROM ( Select ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY fault_description ORDER BY Occurrences desc) ROWNUMS, facility_id "facility_id2", fault_description "fault_description2", Occurrences "Occurrences2", TotalDuration "Duration2" FROM ( select facility_id,fault_description,count(fault_description) Occurrences,sum(convert(float,datediff(SS,start_time,Current_End_Time))/60) TotalDuration from( select fault_description,facility_id,start_time,ISNULL(end_time,GETDATE()) Current_End_Time from PMC.dbo.PMC_BIW_FAULT t where 1 = 1 and convert(varchar(10),start_time,23) in (#{toDate0},#{toDate1},#{toDate2},#{toDate3},#{toDate4},#{toDate5},#{toDate6}) and convert(varchar(10),end_time,23) in (#{toDate0},#{toDate1},#{toDate2},#{toDate3},#{toDate4},#{toDate5},#{toDate6})
and fault_word3 !=0 and duration is not NULL and end_time is not null and t.tav_flag!= 1 )T group by facility_id,fault_description )ALL_DATA )FINAL order by Occurrences2 desc, Duration2 desc, facility_id2,fault_description2 )TOPVALS order by ROWNUMS,Occurrences2 desc
